name: PUZZLETIME: Lovely Girls
description: <br/><br/>PUZZLETIME: Lovely Girls is a classic jigsaw puzzle game in which you need to assemble an image-scene with one of the beautiful girls from many details. The game allows you to relax for an exciting gameplay and get to know the life of 5 beauties during 20 puzzle-scenes. <br/><br/><h3>Features:</h3><br/>5 beautiful girls<br/>20 puzzles<br/>Openable Image Gallery<br/>Achievements<br/>Cards (badges, backgrounds, emoticons) (Soon)<br/>Steam Cloud
